title: Chinese Barbecue Pork & Noodles
summary: Chinese Barbecue Pork & Noodles is a dairy free recipe with 3 servings. For $2.26 per serving, this recipe covers 28% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One portion of this dish contains about 23g of protein, 43g of fat, and a total of 744 calories. It is a budget friendly recipe for fans of American food. If you have garlic, wheat/egg noodles, half a roast duck, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. It works best as a main course, and is done in around 1 hour and 12 minutes. It can be enjoyed any time, but it is especially good for Father's Day. This recipe from SF Gate has 1 fans. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 63%. This score is solid. Try Chinese Wide Noodles with Barbecue Pork and Dried Mushrooms, Chinese Pork 'n' Noodles, and Crockpot Chinese Pork with Noodles for similar recipes.
